intro: Psychotria hemsleyi, commonly known as the Hemsley's psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly found in humid lowland forests. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It produces small, red berries that are often used in traditional medicine. Due to its habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
